lessonGuidance: The end of the game is usually going to be the most difficult as you get down to the parts of the board you saved for last
There are a couple of strategies involving the mine counter that can help with the end game
The first strategy is to look for areas with guaranteed mines as we have throughout these lessons
Count the number of areas with guaranteed mines if you are able to reach the number of mines remaining than any tiles not in your areas are guaranteed safe and can be cleared

The next strategy is to go through combinations. Pick a cell and pretend it is a mine if it was a mine figure out where the other mines would be and if the game board would be solvable with the number of mines you have remaining.
If it is not solvable with the number of mines you have remaining that tile is not a mine and can be cleared

instructions: Using the information about the pattern you just learned, FLAG each tile that you know 100% is a mine going from top left to bottom right of the board. Click the "Next" button at the bottom right of your screen when you are done.
